title: Leaverbuster
body:
why is it so harsh now, when someone in my game quits (normal), i respect that and assume its an emergency or maybe it was a internet cut out. ive had recent ones but they have been 5 and 10 minute ones, i leave 1 game after playing like 30 games and i get a 20 minute queue. god damn why is leaverbuster so harsh now

also its annoying when u create a party with 1 or 2 of your friends and start, waiting a few minutes and another friend logs in during the wait and you have to wait AGAIN.

replies.body: Yeh I'm on a 20 min low priority queue not over afking but uncontrollable dc'ing/errors...it's really stupid. Worried about perma ban right now.
